about_the_game:
Forgotten Depths is a psychological survival horror game that takes you deep into an abandoned mine, where old secrets and supernatural dangers await. As engineer Isaac Lowell, you will confront mysterious events that strain the mind and challenge your will to survive. Join Isaac in this demo on his first exploration into the dark depths of the mine, where every decision is a matter of life and death.

  • Key features of the demo:

  • Atmospheric Psychological Horror: Immerse yourself in a threatening world where darkness, isolation, and psychological threats are your greatest enemies.

  • Survival Mechanics: Carefully manage your resources, keep your flashlight charged, and monitor your stress level, which rises the longer you stay in the dark.

  • Dynamic Darkness: Without light, you are vulnerable. Dark corridors and hallucinations will challenge your perception and judgment.

  • Camp Mechanic: Find and use camps to recover from madness, manage resources, and upgrade your flashlight.

  • Story Insight: This demo offers a glimpse into the eerie backstory of the mine and the strange events that have occurred within it.

Remember, this is only the beginning of your journey. The full version of Forgotten Depths will offer even more deep storytelling, supernatural threats, and challenging survival mechanics.

content_descriptors.notes:
"Forgotten Depths" contains intense horror elements that may be disturbing to more sensitive players. These include:

- Psychological Horror: The game offers a dark atmosphere and threatening scenes that rely heavily on psychological pressure. Players are confronted with themes such as madness, isolation, and hallucinations, triggered by a steady loss of mental stability.

- Depictions of Violence: Supernatural enemies attack the player and can use deadly force. There are bloody scenes and brutal assaults on the player character as well as other figures in the game.

- Dark Themes: The storyline and atmosphere are consistently grim, dealing with themes such as fear of death, loss of mental stability, and the struggle for survival in extremely threatening situations.

- Emotional Distress: The protagonist’s psychological and emotional state deteriorates over the course of the game, depicted through visual and auditory hallucinations.

No sexual content, drug, or alcohol abuse is depicted. However, due to its intense horror themes and violent content, the game is not suitable for younger or sensitive players.
